page.title: 09EDUCATION IN WHEATHAMPSTEAD
page.content: There are three schools in our block.Beech Hyde School is a primary school.It is a JMI school.There are four junior classes and three infant classes.The second and third year classes are in the huts and the infants and first and fourth years are in the main school.Mrs Dalton is our new headmistress and she is Scottish.Mr Green used to be our headmaster but he retired.The secretary is Mrs Chapman.The caretaker is Mr Wilkinson.We have parents coming in to clean the tables when they have packed lunch.The school has been open since 1971.We think our school is a good school. St.Helens is a junior school.It has Junior and Infant classes.The school is at the bottom of the hill in Wheathampstead.
